fa2f56d5-0738-4bad-87a8-9d28284eb37f.description: Earners of the Coach Practitioner Coaching badge haven taken part in a 7 month ICF and EMCC accredited programme which brings together a range of activities including workshops, virtual group supervision after each module, practical assessment of coaching skills, co-supervision practice within the group, access to online learning resources. They've explored and practiced the most effective models and tools from behavioural, transactional analysis and positive psychology coaching.
fa2f56d5-0738-4bad-87a8-9d28284eb37f.name: Coach Practitioner - UK

alignments.name: ICF ACSTH
alignments.description: A minimum of 30 student contact hours are required for ACSTH program accreditation. Graduates from an ACSTH program may apply for the Associate Certified Coach (ACC) Credential or the Professional Certified Coach (PCC) Credential using the ACSTH application path if they meet the credentialing application requirements.

alignments.name: EMCC EIA
alignments.description: The EMCC Global EIA is an internationally recognised award that demonstrates that an individual practising as a professional mentor/coach has the appropriate level of knowledge and the ability to apply it effectively in their practice.

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge taken part in a 7 month ICF and EMCC accredited programme comprising of the following modules – Module 1– Foundation Coaching Skills, Module 2– Creating Insights, Module 3 – Applied Positive Psychology in Coaching , Module 4 - Coaching Through Ambiguity and Complexity. In addition the have also attended virtual group supervision after each module, had practical assessments of their coaching skills and taken part in co-supervision practice.

b0848998-32b6-4a00-8f21-b0ba17231d81.description: Earners of the Transformational Leadership Coaching badge haven taken part in a 10 month ICF accredited course which brings together a range of activities including workshops, group and 1:1 mentoring, group and peer supervision and coaching practice. They've explored and practiced the most effective models and tools from behavioural, transactional analysis and positive psychology coaching and acquired the leadership coaching competencies needed to work at the highest level with leaders & teams.
b0848998-32b6-4a00-8f21-b0ba17231d81.name: Transformational Leadership Coaching - ICF ACTP

alignments.name: ICF ACTP
alignments.description: ACTP accredited programs are considered “all inclusive” training programs which offer start to finish coach training. Minimum 125 student contact hours, Mentor Coaching and a performance evaluation process are required for ACTP approval. Graduates of an ACTP program may apply for an individual ICF Credential via the ACTP credential application path

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge completed the following modules: Module 1: Coaching Foundation: The leader as a coach, Module 2: Creating Insights: Coaching with emotional intelligence, Module 3: Positive psychology coaching, Module 4: Coaching through change and complexity, Module 5: Team coaching Module,  6: Coach integration. During the programme participants have also taken part in both one-to-one and group mentoring sessions.

252a2033-5c65-4d87-87bd-e661613be019.description: Earners of the Coaching Foundations badge haven taken part in a 3 day ICF accredited course (Module 1 of our Transformational Leadership Coaching Programme) which brings together a range of activities including workshops and coaching practice. They've explored and practiced some of the most effective models and tools for leadership coaching.
252a2033-5c65-4d87-87bd-e661613be019.name: Coaching Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge completed the following modules Coaching Foundations

They've explored and practiced the most effective models and tools from behavioural, transactional analysis and positive psychology coaching.
1f482856-6024-45f2-aa91-6bb538cdb26b.name: Coach Practitioner - ICF ACSTH

In addition the have also attended virtual group supervision after each module, had practical assessments of their coaching skills and taken part in co-supervision practice.

cdc59046-0471-4c65-b87c-e2122a279938.description: This course supports participants to make the mental shift from focusing on self, delivering high quality work, to people manager and leader, enabling others to be successful.
cdc59046-0471-4c65-b87c-e2122a279938.name: Leadership Program - EDFI

badge_template_activities.title: This program covers the following topics - Building Self Awareness, Personal Profiling, Emotional Intelligence, Team Effectiveness, Leadership Styles, Management by Objectives

d2c70dae-2d42-4044-85b7-4928c79a3596.description: Earners of the Coach Practitioner badge have taken part in 63-hrs of classroom training - ICF accredited program which brings together a range of activities including classroom training, group supervision after each module, practical assessment of coaching skills, co-supervision practice within the group, and access to online learning resources. Participants have explored and practiced the most effective models and tools from behavioral, transactional analysis and positive psychology coaching
d2c70dae-2d42-4044-85b7-4928c79a3596.name: Coach Practitioner Program - SEA

Graduates from an ACSTH program may apply for the Associate Certified Coach (ACC) Credential or the Professional Certified Coach (PCC) Credential using the ACSTH application path if they meet the credentialing application requirements.

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge taken part in a ICF accredited programme comprising of the following modules: Module 1 - Coaching Foundations Module 2 - Coaching with Emotional Intelligence Module 3 - Applied Positive Psychology in Coaching Module 4 - Coaching through Ambiguity & Complexity. In addition the have also attended virtual group supervision after each module, had practical assessments of their coaching skills and taken part in co-supervision practice.
